task.title: Attach a Volume
task.shortdesc: This dialog box lets you attach an EBS volume to an instance running in the same availability zone.

step.cmd: Select the volume to attach from the Volume drop-down list box (the volume is pre-selected for you if you navigated to this dialog from the Manage Volumes screen).
Select a running instance from the Instance drop-down list box (this instance is pre-selectef for you if you navigated to this dialog from the Manage Instances screen.
To optionally specify a device name to use for the attached volume, type the device name into the Attach as device text box.
